desc: Delivering Smiles Worldwide Since 1925! Discover our fresh flowers, plants & gift baskets and florist-designed arrangements. Flower delivery is easy at 1-800-YES-SMILE (800-937-7645) and buning.com.

layout.text: We know how important it is for your loved ones to receive their flowers on time. That's why we offer same-day delivery for all orders placed before 1 PM in the recipients' time zone.
